Hello to everyone. While leaving 2011, we wanted to greet you with my wife, Mrs. Hayrunnisa.
As a family of roses, we congratulate all of our citizens for the new year.
We wish 2012 will bring peace, peace and well-being to our country and all humanity.
I would also like to announce a topic that many of us are waiting for after the New Year greeting.
May presents sunset take with it all our woes, disappointments & pain. And may tomorrows sunrise bring us all peace, goodness & joy.Happy 2012
The 'Issue to the President' application, which I expect to be a new channel in direct communication with you, will begin on the first day of the new year.
With this application, you will be able to directly contact me with your questions, evaluate the questions asked, choose the most popular ones.
The questions you like most, the owners will ask me at Çankaya Mansion, I will give their answers to them personally.
You will be able to access the 'Issue to the President' application from now on: http://t.co/JTCFptAV
My wife and I wish everyone a nice weekend.

Today, with great work of brigadistas and intense use of helicopters, we have managed to control 3 of the 6 foci of the fire in Torres del Paine
Thanks to the better climate, we hope to soon control a fourth fire source and immediately start the recovery tasks of the park
I have asked Mayor to meet with tourism companies in the park to agree on a quicker reopening and protect the rest of the tourist season
I appreciate the selfless and courageous work of the 600 brigadistas and the help of Argentina, Uruguay and the United States, in the fight against the fire
